closed_reason: Investigated: uv run baseline is ~80ms, Python import is ~90ms, mb CLI total is ~220ms. The ~130ms overhead is mainly from Click framework (~40ms) which is necessary. Startup time is reasonable. Users wanting faster startup can install globally with 'pip install microbeads' or 'pipx install microbeads'.
description: uv run mb create feels slow. Profile startup time - may be uv overhead, venv creation, or module imports. Consider caching or lazy loading.
title: Investigate slow uv run startup time
